com.me.tiledMapGame.pathing

Class GridLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.me.tiledMapGame.pathing.GridLayer

  • public class GridLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds a 2D array of Nodes, which represents squares on a Tiled Map.

    *Note: (0,0) marks the bottom left.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GridLayer(int length, int width)
      Initializes a 2 Dimensional Array of Nodes, known as "grid", for use by PathFinder.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Getter method for this GridLayer's 2 Dimensional array of Nodes.
      com.me.tiledMapGame.pathing.Node getNodeInGrid(int x, int y)
      Quickly access the node specified by x and y in grid.
